meanings.sent1: The cat circumambulates the tree in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She circumambulates the park every morning for exercise.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel circumambulates the bird feeder looking for food.
meanings.sent4: The river circumambulates the small island, creating a peaceful scene.
meanings.sent5: The child circumambulates the playground, exploring every corner.

meanings.definition: Moves in a circular path around something
meanings.sent1: The planets circumambulate the sun in our solar system.
meanings.sent2: The dancers circumambulate the stage gracefully during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The bee circumambulates the flower before landing on it.
meanings.sent4: The satellite circumambulates the Earth, capturing images from space.
meanings.sent5: The athlete circumambulates the track before starting the race.
